review_data.title: Delicious meal
review_data.content: We went here with my cousin for dinner. The menu is small but interesting. My partner and I both ordered the liver cooked in white wine - it was delicious. Quite good value for Switzerland.

review_data.title: Gemütlich, authentisch, nett, einfach normal

review_data.title: Alles wird gut
review_data.content: Wenn sich der Standard des Personals des Piccolo Giardino in Bezug auf Aufmerksamkeit, Freundlichkeit und Gastlichkeit auf die andere Lokale...More

review_data.title: Good food, great service
review_data.content: We went there for dinner and drinks and to play cards. The waiter was very nice and very attentive. They forgo to place my food order at the kitchen and when they discovered their mistake they offered me a free drink. We were frequently asked...More

review_data.title: Недорогое кафе
review_data.content: Сняв апартаменты в соседнем доме первое место куда мы зашли вечером было это кафе-паб. Там было довольно шумно и моросил...More

review_data.title: Nice restaurant and bar
review_data.content: The Piccolo giardino is a really nice place for eating and drinking. They have a small menu, but everything is made with love and with local products. At sundays they show the "Tatort" (like a crime series in german) on a big screen. I can...More

review_data.title: Outdoor seating - pleasant
review_data.content: Quick bite before train - outdoor seating - warm day. Good for drink and snack - food tasty but not exceptional.

review_data.title: Good place for a drink but definitely not a ristorante
review_data.content: Piccolo Giardino (small garden in the Italian) was one of the restaurants listed in the iQ130 guide which we looked at while staying in said hotel directly across the road. (See separate review). Tired, fed-up, and hungry after a 750-mike 15-hour drive from wast Oxfordshire,...More

review_data.title: Nice place
review_data.content: Nice place to have a drink with friends, not far from the main station and a bit secluded from the chaos of the langstrasse

review_data.title: Good spot for a drink
review_data.content: We had a group of eight people go here for drinks on a Friday night. The drinks were good, service was nice, not too crowded. The music was not too loud so we could talk with one another. Great little spot.

review_data.title: Angenehme Sportbar

review_data.title: Entspannte Atmosphäre
review_data.content: Es ist im Piccolo Giardino immer sehr sympathisch und angenehm. Man fühlt sich willkommen und zum draußen sitzen ist es...More

review_data.title: Sweet spot for a drink and a tasty meal with the young local crowd
review_data.content: The bar/bistro offers cozy indoors space and a spacious terrace under the wide branches of an old tree outside. Tasty daily changing dishes with a few classics like the unbeatable local sausages from the butcher. Food and drinks are made with handpicked ingredients and with...More

review_data.title: Sehr fein, sehr frisch und sehr nett!
review_data.content: Immer feine und frische Mittagsmenüs, angenehme Wartezeiten, freundlicher Service. Abends kleinere Speisen mit Getränk! Wunderbar mit Freunde!

review_data.title: Nice restaurant for a summer evening

review_data.title: A good meeting spot

review_data.title: Easy going bar with nice menu but food could be improved
